name: Matterhorn Mirka
description:
MATTERHORN MIRKA IS A CASUAL STEALTH GAME ABOUT A DISGRUNTLED YETI WHO WANTS PRIVACY

YOU ARE THE YETI, KNOWN BY THE LOCALS AS THE MIRKA

EVERY YEAR, HUNDREDS OF PEOPLE CLIMB MOUNT MATTERHORN FOR THE CHANCE TO CATCH THE ABOMINABLE SNOWMAN

TIRED OF ALL THE ATTENTION AND JUST WANTING TO BE LEFT ALONE, YOU NEED TO EVADE THE HUMANS

PICK UP YOUR PHOTOS BEFORE THE HUMANS DO

FREEZE HUMANS TO GET A MOMENT OF PEACE

TURN THE FLOOR INTO ICE TO MAKE YOURSELF AN ICE SKATING RINK

AN IMPROVED VERSION OF THE GAME MADE FOR LUDUM DARE 33
